name: Getting into Griffin Door
description:
Get the Griffon back to its door.

An egg has fallen from its nest. It is your job to protect the egg until it hatches. Then protect and lead the griffon back home to its nest while avoiding snakes and vultures.

Game Design and Programming by Christian Basiga

Art and Animation by Alex Hernandez. 

https://www.instagram.com/renee.alexandra_/

Made in Unity for https://itch.io/jam/virtual-pet-jam hosted by Dogpit.

Controls:

wasd and arrow keys for movement.

Space or Z for jumping.

X,E and R,C pick up and drop griffon respectivley.

F will toggle fishing mode when on platform t fish, X in this case is for hooking onto fish as they pass by.

V is for dropping items from inventory slots.
